metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Django Online Compiler
Django Compiler (Editor)
If you want to create your own website or build Python applications using Django, check out W3Schools Spaces .
content.html: If you want to create your own website or build Python applications using Django, check out W3Schools Spaces.

content.text: W3Schools Spaces is a website-building tool that enables you to create and share your own website, as well as develop and host your Python applications using Django.
content.html: W3Schools Spaces is a website-building tool that enables you to create and share your own website, as well as develop and host your Python applications using Django.

content.text: You have full control over the website's appearance and functionality by editing the code directly in your web browser.
content.html: You have full control over the website's appearance and functionality by editing the code directly in your web browser.

content.text: W3Schools Spaces is user-friendly and requires no setup, making it easy to use.
content.html: W3Schools Spaces is user-friendly and requires no setup, making it easy to use.

content.text: Get started with Django by selecting the Python environment in Spaces.
content.html: Get started with Django by selecting the Python environment in Spaces.

content.text: The code editor is packed with features to help you achieve more:
content.html: The code editor is packed with features to help you achieve more:

content.text: Learn Faster
Practice is key to mastering coding, and the best way to put your Django knowledge into practice is by getting practical with code.
content.html: Practice is key to mastering coding, and the best way to put your Django knowledge into practice is by getting practical with code.

content.text: Use W3Schools Spaces to build, test and deploy code.
content.html: Use W3Schools Spaces to build, test and deploy code.

content.text: The code editor lets you write and practice different types of computer languages. It includes Django, but you can use it for other languages too.
content.html: The code editor lets you write and practice different types of computer languages. It includes Django, but you can use it for other languages too.

content.text: New languages are added all the time:
content.html: New languages are added all the time:

content.text: If you don't know Django, we suggest that you read our Django Tutorial from scratch.
content.html: If you don't know Django, we suggest that you read our Django Tutorial from scratch.

content.text: If you don't know Python, we suggest that you read our Python Tutorial from scratch.
content.html: If you don't know Python, we suggest that you read our Python Tutorial from scratch.

content.text: Easy Package Management
Get an overview of your packages and easily add or delete frameworks and libraries. Then, with just one click, you can make changes to your packages without manual installation.
content.html: Get an overview of your packages and easily add or delete frameworks and libraries. Then, with just one click, you can make changes to your packages without manual installation.

content.text: Build Powerful Websites
You can use the code editor in W3School Spaces to build frontend or full-stack websites from scratch.
content.html: You can use the code editor in W3School Spaces to build frontend or full-stack websites from scratch.

content.text: Or you can use the 60+ templates available and save time:
content.html: Or you can use the 60+ templates available and save time:

content.text: Create your Spaces account today and explore them all!
content.html: Create your Spaces account today and explore them all!

content.text: Share Your Website With The World
Host and publish your websites in no time with W3School Spaces .
content.html: Host and publish your websites in no time with W3School Spaces.

content.text: W3Schools subdomain and SSL certificate are included for free with W3School Spaces . An SSL certificate makes your website safe and secure. It also helps people trust your website and makes it easier to find it online.
content.html: W3Schools subdomain and SSL certificate are included for free with W3School Spaces. An SSL certificate makes your website safe and secure. It also helps people trust your website and makes it easier to find it online.

content.text: Want a custom domain for your website?
content.html: Want a custom domain for your website?

content.text: You can buy a domain or transfer an existing one and connect it to your space.
content.html: You can buy a domain or transfer an existing one and connect it to your space.

content.text: How Does It Work?
Get started in a few clicks with W3School Spaces .
content.html: Get started in a few clicks with W3School Spaces.
